The [Analytics Edge](https://www.edx.org/course/the-analytics-edge) is a project based course offered by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) on EdX that impart skills in R, Statistics, and the basics of machine learning. The nine courses are:

-   Data Science: R Basics
-   Data Science: Visualization
-   Data Science: Probability
-   Data Science: Inference and Modeling
-   Data Science: Productivity Tools
-   Data Science: Wrangling
-   Data Science: Linear Regression
-   Data Science: Machine Learning
-   Data Science: Capstone

My final certificate is available on this [link](https://courses.edx.org/certificates/0348a316d7e34fa3be5541880f47e005) <https://courses.edx.org/certificates/0348a316d7e34fa3be5541880f47e005>
